content.text:
# List of Irish-speaking people

This article lists notable speakers of the Irish language (, pl. Gaeilgeoirí).

* John Creedon

The following non-natives have been known to use the Irish language:
* Stan Collymore
* Stephen Fry
* Charlie Day
